marketingTips.title: Banners
marketingTips.tip: Keep banner designs simple and memorable. Use unique images, large bold headlines, contrasting colors, and creative artwork to grab attention.

marketingTips.title: Flyers
marketingTips.tip: Don’t overwhelm with info. Use attractive images and just enough info (like contact details or discounts) to spark curiosity. Distribute within a 1–3-mile radius for best response.

marketingTips.title: Stickers
marketingTips.tip: Stickers are great for grassroots marketing. Hand them out at events or add to packaging—they’re cheaper than printing logos on boxes and stick around longer.

marketingTips.title: T-Shirts & Hats
marketingTips.tip: Bold designs on dark fabrics grab attention!

marketingTips.title: General Design
marketingTips.tip: Keep designs simple and bold for maximum impact!

faqs.question: What paper stocks are available for business cards?
faqs.answer: Gloss (16 pt.) for a shiny finish, Matte (14 pt.) for a vintage look, and Premium (18 pt.) for a thicker, high-quality feel.

faqs.question: What T-shirt styles and sizes are available?
faqs.answer: Crew Neck, V-Neck, and Long Sleeve T-shirts in sizes XS-XXL.

faqs.question: Are banners suitable for outdoor use?
faqs.answer: Yes, our banners are made of 13 oz. vinyl, waterproof, and UV-safe, perfect for indoor and outdoor use.

faqs.question: What sizes can I choose for flyers?
faqs.answer: Flyers are available in 4" x 6", 8.5" x 5.5", and 8.5" x 11".

faqs.question: What sizes are available for stickers?
faqs.answer: Stickers range from 1" x 1" to 6" x 6", with various sizes in between.

faqs.question: What shipping options are available?
faqs.answer: Standard (5-7 days), Express (2-3 days), and Local Pickup for all products.
